config_markup.conversion_label: 訪問者がページに移動します
config_markup.error_conversionpage: A/Bテストを保存する前に、コンバージョンページを選択する必要があります。
config_markup.error_selected_notpublished: コンバージョンの目標ページとして未公開のページを選択することはできません。
config_markup.error_selected_samepage: コンバージョンの目標ページとしてテスト中のページを選択することはできません。

content_comparator_kpi.description: The chosen page is the one that a user must click on in order to count as a conversion. Results: Views are the number of visitors that visit the page under test. Conversions are the number of visitors that clicked through to the landing page at any point in the future while the test was running.
content_comparator_kpi.name: Landing Page

readonly_markup.conversion_selector_description: 訪問者がページに移動します

kpi_messaging.failed_to_load: 読み込みに失敗しました
kpi_messaging.missing_client: Client Script Wrapper resource could not be found
kpi_messaging.uimarkup_not_defined: UIMarkupAttribute クラスの属性が定義されていません。

config_markup.conversion_label: Number of minutes until another page is visited
config_markup.error_invalid_timeoutvalue: Number of minutes must be a value between 1 and 60

stickysite_kpi.description: Converts when a user visits the content under test and then visits any other page within the same browser session. Results: Views are the number of visitors that visited the web page. Conversions are the number of visitors that clicked through to any other page within the specified time.
stickysite_kpi.name: Site Stickiness

readonly_markup.conversion_selector_description: Visitor navigates to any other page within {0} minute(s).

config_markup.conversionlabel: Number of minutes visitor remains on the page.
config_markup.notpositiveinteger: Value must enter a valid whole number and greater than 0.

timeonpage_kpi.description: Monitors how long a visitor spends on a page and converts after a specified amount of time. Views: Number of visitors that viewed the page under test. Conversions: The number of visitors that remained on the page for the minimum time specified.
timeonpage_kpi.name: Time on Page

readonly_markup.conversion_selector_description: Number of minutes visitor remains on the page:
